verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Almost persuaded
Now to believe
Almost persuaded
Christ to receive
Seems now some soul to say
Go Spirit go away
Some more convenient day
On Thee I'll call

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Almost persuaded
Come come today
Almost persuaded
Turn not away
Jesus invites you here
Angels are ling'ring near
Prayers rise from hearts so dear
O wand'rer come

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Almost persuaded
Harvest is past
Almost persuaded
Doom comes at last
Almost cannot avail
Almost is but to fail
Sad sad that bitter wail
Almost but lost
